snippet: In an online video, the rapper and actor turns a spotlight on the controversial procedure of force-feeding detainees on hunger strike at the prison at Guantánamo Bay, Cuba.
abstract: In an online video, the rapper and actor turns a spotlight on the controversial procedure of force-feeding detainees on hunger strike at the prison at Guantánamo Bay, Cuba.

headline.main: Mos Def Video Puts Force-Feeding in Spotlight
